instruction: Describe how to make the given Mexican dish.
output:
To make tostadas, start by heating a skillet over medium heat and then lightly toast the tortillas in the skillet. Once they are golden, remove from the skillet and set aside.

In the same skillet, cook the refried beans, stirring frequently, until they are heated through. Spread the beans onto the tostadas.

Top the tostadas with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and onion. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Serve with sour cream and salsa. Enjoy!
